content: * *Upper Serangoon Constituency** was a constituency in [Upper Serangoon](/wiki/Serangoon), Singapore from 1959 to 1980. In 1959, the constituency is formed by absorbing part of [Serangoon](/wiki/Serangoon_Constituency) and [Paya Lebar constituencies](/wiki/Paya_Lebar_Constituency). ## Member of Parliament **Election** **Member of Parliament****Party**[Legislative Assembly of Singapore](/wiki/Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore)**1959**Chan Sun Wing[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1963**Sia Kah Hui[Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)**1972**Sia Kah Hui[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1976** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1950s [General Election 1959](/wiki/1959_Singaporean_general_election) PartyCandidateVotes%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****Chan Sun Wing** **4,497** **45.06** [SPA](/wiki/Singapore_People%27s_Alliance)Lim Choon Mong4,37243.81[LSP](/wiki/Liberal_Socialist_Party)Sin Cho Lang9019.03[Citizens' Party (Singapore)](/wiki/Citizens%27_Party_(Singapore))Tan Choon Teng2092.1Majority1251.34[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)11,279[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)9,97988.47[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat) ### Elections in 1960s [General Election 1963](/wiki/1963_Singaporean_general_election) PartyCandidateVotes%Â±%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****Sia Kah Hui** **6,650** **56.56** **N/A** [BS](/wiki/Barisan_Sosialis)Chia Yang Loong3,54730.17N/A[Independent](/wiki/Independent_(politician))Lim Choon Mong5734.87N/A[UPP](/wiki/United_People%27s_Party_(Singapore))Phua Gek Boon5955.06N/A[SA](/wiki/Singapore_Alliance)Wu Moh Chye3933.34N/A[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)310326.3925.05[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)12,43310.23[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)11,75894.576.1[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics))25.05 https://www.nas.gov.sg/archivesonline/maps_building_plans/record-details/31abae25-014f-11e6-b6f6-0050568939ad This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub.
